short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The perfect extension for space lovers and fanatics

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you consider yourself a space fanatic, this extension is made for you.

The Cosmos extension sets different space themed backgrounds to your new tabs, as well as adding a clock, the current date, and several social widgets.
Users can shuffle the backgrounds by clicking the button on the top right corner of the screen. 


By clicking "Add to Chrome", users accept and agree to installing the Cosmos extension, setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab and Default Search to Bing, and to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
